title: Deploy Scaleout VMs in Existing vApp

messages.content: Deploy Scaleout VMs in Existing vApp

**Deploy Scaleout VMs in Existing vApp**

To deploy scaleout VMs inside of the SRM vApp, follow these steps:

1. Log in to the vCenter managing the vApp you want to scale out.
2. Right-click the vApp and select **Shut Down**. Wait for all VMs in the vApp to shut down completely.

_Refer to page 3-10 of "Deploy Scaleout VMs in Existing vApp" for more information._

3. Deploy additional Dell SRM vApp VMs using the provided procedure.

4. Post-deployment, pre-startup tasks will be performed automatically by Dell SRM.

_The context does not provide explicit details on this step._
